sentences.sContent: But how do we know we have the true, undistorted picture of reality?
sentences.sContent_eng: But how do we know we have the true, undistorted picture of reality?
sentences.sCn: 然而我们如何敢断定自己看到的现实景象是真切的、不失真的呢？

sentences.sContent: At the receive end, we can not only get the undistorted range profile image, but also get some available conclusion by use of the crasis of the extent.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the receive end, we can not only get the undistorted range profile image, but also get some available conclusion by use of the crasis of the extent.
sentences.sCn: 在收端，通过对获得的一对复侧影像幅度的联合处理（融合），达到获得不失真的侧影像幅度的目的，且能够恢复目标的实际轮廓。

synos.tran: 未失真的；不偏激的；[电子]无畸变的
